channel.title: The new stuff
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The new stuff" - I want to know

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded:
The reference to Rinnengan is definitely there, but there's little doubt at this point that the power of Greass is from Code Geass. It's Lulu's Geass power.

But 11DBHK loves double meanings.

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded: I believe ring eye is the Kekkai Genkai of Pain from Naruto.

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded: Pirates and Ronin are indeed upcoming additions to the game, although you shouldn't expect them any time soon. They're major additions, much larger than the BurgerNinja addition. McM says they're each about equal in size to the original BvS game (before Reapers, Monochrome, Wastelands, and BurgerNinja), if I remember correctly.

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded:
I doubt that, as Pirates and Ninja are natural foes…although legacy does call on the power fo the pirate……

Anyway, I wonder if we'll get any FMA like I asked with Alchemy Missions.

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded: Well i think thats coming to. That and Ronin. Not sure when.

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded: I have watched,it's a cool anime but i want to have pirates in the game x) x) from One piece

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded: Can't speak a great deal on CG since I haven't watched it, but it seems at if a few Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann references may be inbound as well. We may not get a drill to pierce the heavens, but starting by drilling a "tiny, but well-placed, hole" certainly matchs that anime in my mind.

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded: Yes the page is up and it is based off code geass. Basically it is doujutsu from what i read. I have already took out about 30 of the success. That is with 90 stam. Tommarow ill get 400 and i should be abl to get to 90 or 100. Oh and doujutsu is sharingan or byakugan. Eye techniques basically. So Amaterasu is doujutsu.

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded: If so i requested a Code Geass section to masters. So it may be possible. I also wanted burger ninja too. And many other things were mmade true i wanted. The inter village item trade was one.

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded:
Apparently, this new chain is based off Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion. The RingEye is the Geass in Code: Geass. My guess anyway.

BloodyANBU (BvS name)

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded: the village im in is still 2 members short of NRF ><'

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded:
BURGERNINJA IS GO! New section Launched! Also, the Survey Potions are out there, enjoy!

It is now live ;)

So discussion? Anyone know anything yet?

item.title: Re: The new stuff
item.content:encoded: We will all know later this day. I don't have any idea about it, nor does anyone here I think.

item.title: The new stuff
item.content:encoded:
News:
Save That Stamina, true believers - an entire new game section launches Wednesday at before 5PM EST (so I can be awake and watch the bug reports - it'll launch sometime earlier than 5). New Bloodline, Allies, Missions, Items, and a NEW FREAKING STAT WHAT NOW THAT'S RIGHT. I've found that musing less about these things on forums, and actually Getting Them Done, works really well. :)

The Starting Step: Villages will buy a very helpful Upgrade which grants a kind of extra Stamina. This upgrades it only open to those with an NRF.

Does anyone has an idea what is this all about?..???
